alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:27AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Grant County through 445 AM CDT... At 427 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Platteville to near Springbrook. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Platteville around 430 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Platteville Airport, Sinsinawa, Big Patch, Arthur and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
